```{r}
compare_ols_ridge <- function(responses, predictors, lambda=1){
  fulldata = data.frame(responses, predictors)
  x = fulldata[,-1]
  y = fulldata[1]
  xnames = seq(1, ncol(predictors))
  
  # Create training and testing data
  set.seed(1)
  train = sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), nrow(fulldata), rep = TRUE)
  test = (!train)
  response.test = y[test,]
  
  # Creating lm and ridge models
  lm.mod = lm(responses ~ predictors, data = train)
  ridge.mod = glmnet(x[train,], y[train,], alpha = 0)
  
  # LM predictions and error
  lm.pred = predict(lm.mod, newdata = train)
  ols_in = mean((lm.pred$residuals)^2)
  
  # Ridge predictions and error
  ridge.pred = predict(ridge.mod, lambda, newx = x[test,])
  ridge_in = mean((ridge.pred - response.test)^2)
  ridge_out = mean(((predict(ridge.mod, lambda, type = "coefficients") - response.test))^2)
  resultsVector = c(lambda, ridge_in, ols_in, ridge_out)
  return(resultsVector)
}

responses = GenCont[1]
predictors = GenCont[,-1]
Shrink_results = compare_ols_ridge(responses, predictors)
```
